A

AreaShape - Class in irauenzahn053.shapes
Represents any shape with an area

C

Circle - Class in irauenzahn053.shapes
Represents a perfect circle, has some simple mathematical calculations and can draw itself given a Processing PApplet
Circle() - Constructor for class irauenzahn053.shapes.Circle
Creates a default instance of a Circle object with all dimensions set to zero, with no fill.
Circle(int, int, int) - Constructor for class irauenzahn053.shapes.Circle
Creates a new instance of a Circle object with the left and right edges of the circle at x - radius and x + radius.
